examples.pinyin: Shēngrì nà tiān wǒ huì qǐngjià.
examples.english: I will take leave on my birthday.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ kěyǐ wèn nǐ wèntí ma?
examples.english: Can I ask you a question?
I often go to the library.
The two of us will go.

examples.pinyin: Tā jièshào xīn péngyǒu gěi wǒ.
examples.english: He introduced a new friend to me.
Please turn on the light when it gets dark.
Turn on the light first when entering the room.
Turn on the light when reading.

examples.pinyin: Xià yǔ le, kuài guān chuāng.
examples.english: It's raining, close the window quickly.
Close the window to prevent mosquitoes from coming in.
We need to turn on the AC in summer.
The office air conditioner is too cold.

examples.pinyin: Xǐ wán yīfú yào fàng hǎo.
Qǐng bǎ yīfú fàng jìn yīguì.
examples.english: Please put the clothes in the wardrobe.
He forgot to put away the clothes.
Remember to take out the trash every day.
He went downstairs to throw the trash.
He had his hair cut short.
I'm happy to receive a gift.
Don't be sad over small things.
She was sad to hear the news.
This task is a piece of cake.

examples.chinese: 数学题对他来说小菜一碟。
examples.pinyin: Shùxuétí duì tā lái shuō xiǎocàiyīdié.
examples.english: Math problems are a piece of cake for him.
Fix the computer? Piece of cake!

examples.pinyin: Nǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo chūfā le ma?
Hé lǐ yǒu hěn duō yú.
examples.english: There are many fish in the river.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī jiàn yīfu.
examples.english: I bought a piece of clothing.

examples.pinyin: Tā shèjì le yī jiàn yīfu.
examples.english: She designed a piece of clothing.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu hěn duō shìqing yào zuò.
examples.english: I have many things to do.

examples.chinese: 生活中很多事情很重要。
examples.pinyin: Shēnghuó zhōng hěn duō shìqing hěn zhòngyào.
examples.english: Many things in life are important.

examples.pinyin: Tā jīnglì le hěn duō shìqing.
Tā de zhōngwén shuō dé búcuò.
Zhè piān wénzhāng yǒudiǎn er cháng.
examples.english: This article is a bit long.
The movie is a bit long.
The meeting duration is a bit long.
Lamb noodles are a specialty dish.
The takeout will arrive in half an hour.
He rarely goes to the gym.
He often goes to the gym.
I often forget to bring keys.
Exercising often is good for health.
I ride a bicycle to work.
The bicycle is parked outside the door.
See you again in three years.
The bicycle is outside the door.

examples.pinyin: Mén wài yǒu rén zhǎo nǐ.
examples.english: Someone is looking for you outside.

examples.pinyin: Tā yóuyǒng yóu dé hěn kuài.

examples.english: Go to the airport to pick up friends.
See you at the airport tomorrow.

examples.pinyin: Huí jiā de lù hěn yuǎn.
Yǒu shíhou wǒ huì zǎo qǐ.

examples.english: Mom told me to study hard.
Only by studying hard can you make progress.
Go to the train station to pick someone up.
There are many people at the train station.
Take the subway from the train station.
I work at a tech company.
The company starts work at 9 o'clock.
The unit of RMB is yuan.
The supermarket is very close to my home.
A close neighbor is better than a distant relative.
Mom asks me to sleep early.
We wait for him to come.

examples.pinyin: Děng yī děng, wǒ mǎshàng lái.
examples.english: Wait a moment, I'll be right there.
The waiter has a good attitude.
Don't be afraid of making mistakes.

examples.pinyin: Tā kǎo le dì yī míng.
examples.english: He got first place in the exam.
I have a question to ask.

examples.chinese: 他看起来不高兴，怎么了？
examples.pinyin: Tā kàn qǐlái bù gāoxìng, zěnme le?
Chī wán le jiù xiě zuòyè.

examples.english: The exam questions are very difficult.
Write an essay on the topic.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī méi diàn le.
examples.english: My phone is out of battery.
Don't always look at your phone.

examples.chinese: 男生在左边，女生在右边。
examples.pinyin: Nánshēng zài zuǒbiān, nǚshēng zài yòubiān.
examples.english: Boys on the left, girls on the right.
The boy likes to kick the shuttlecock.

examples.pinyin: Jiàoshì lǐ yǒu shí gè nánshēng.
examples.english: There are ten boys in the classroom.

examples.pinyin: Zhège bān yǒu èrshí gè nǚshēng.
examples.english: There are twenty girls in this class.
The book is on the right side of the table.

examples.pinyin: Gǒu bǐ māo pǎo dé kuài.

examples.english: The road is slippery when it snows.

examples.pinyin: Háizi huì zìjǐ chuān yīfu le.
examples.english: The child can dress himself now.
Quickly put on clothes and go out.
Please come in and sit in the room.
Take off shoes when entering the room.
My home is far from school.
The scenery in the distance is beautiful.

examples.pinyin: Zhè běn shū bǐ nà běn guì.
examples.english: This book is more expensive than that one.

examples.pinyin: Nǐ bǐ tā pǎo de kuài.
